summary: AT 3807 MILES 1ST TRANSMISSION FOUND TO HAVE BEEN SENT FROM FACTORY MISSING GEAR, TRANSMISSION REPLACED. ANOTHER FORD DEALER HAD TO TELL ME THIS WAS A REFURBISHED TRANSMISSION AND TO CALL THEM ON IT, WHICH THEY ADMITTED TO ON FRIDAY JUNE 6TH, 2003. DEALER SAYS THEY CALLED FORD HDQ WHO SAID TRANSMISSION MY RESPONSIBILITY TO FIX NOW, AND DEALER WILL NOT STAND BEHIND VEHICLE EITHER.*AK
